WidthMode: How the drawn path width gets set
Width: Width of the drawn path when using Fixed width mode; also shows the width in Interactive width mode
bRoundedCorners: Use arc segments instead of straight lines in corners
RadiusMode: How the rounded corner radius gets set
CornerRadius: Radius of the corner arcs, as a fraction of path width. This is only available if Rounded Corners is enabled.
RadialSlices: Number of radial subdivisions for rounded corners
bSinglePolyGroup: If true, all quads on the path will belong to the same polygon. If false, each quad gets its own polygon.
ExtrudeMode: If and how the drawn path gets extruded
ExtrudeHeight: Extrusion distance when using the Fixed extrude modes; also shows the distance in Interactive extrude modes
RampStartRatio: Height of the start of the ramp as a fraction of the Extrude Height property
